Caprese Salad.name: Caprese Salad
Caprese Salad.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

Garlic Parmesan Wings.name: Garlic Parmesan Wings
Garlic Parmesan Wings.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in garlic parmesan sauce.

Spinach Artichoke Dip.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
Spinach Artichoke Dip.description: Creamy spinach and artichokes served with tortilla chips.

Grilled Salmon.name: Grilled Salmon
Grilled Salmon.description: Grilled Atlantic salmon served with seasoned vegetables and wild rice.

Steak Frites.name: Steak Frites
Steak Frites.description: Grilled sirloin steak with herb butter and a side of crispy french fries.

Vegetable Stir-Fry.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Vegetable Stir-Fry.description: Mixed vegetables stir-fried with tofu in a savory sauce, served with steamed jasmine rice.

Spaghetti Bolognese.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
Spaghetti Bolognese.description: Spaghetti pasta served with homemade beef Bolognese sauce.

Chicken Alfredo.name: Chicken Alfredo
Chicken Alfredo.description: Fettuccine pasta with grilled chicken and creamy Alfredo sauce.

Pesto Tortellini.name: Pesto Tortellini
Pesto Tortellini.description: Cheese-filled tortellini with basil pesto and cherry tomatoes.

New York Cheesecake.name: New York Cheesecake
New York Cheesecake.description: Classic rich and creamy cheesecake served with berry compote.

Chocolate Lava Cake.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Chocolate Lava Cake.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

Fruit Tart.name: Fruit Tart
Fruit Tart.description: Shortcrust pastry filled with pastry cream and topped with fresh seasonal fruits.
